name: Idol of Mutilation
htmlTooltip:
Idol of Mutilation
Binds when picked up
Unique
RelicIdol
Requires Level 80
Item Level 245
Equip: While in Bear Form, your Lacerate and Swipe abilities have a chance to grant 200 (4.42% @ L80) dodge rating for 9 sec, and your Cat Form's Mangle and Shred abilities have a chance to grant 200 Agility for 16 sec.
